document_data.mainbody:
he Semberflow was a river in the Cormanthor forest.On page 7 of the Cormanthor booklet of Elminsters Ecologies, the Semberflow is called a stream, yet in the Settled Lands section of Elminsters Ecologies, it is stated as being a river. Also, page 96 of Cormanthyr Empire of the Elves, names the Semberflow as a river.
The stream flowed from Lake Sember to the River Verire.
The waters of the Semberflow ran clear and was home to large numbers of bass and catfish.
